list.name: BAD-KARMA
list.description: Enemies that stay within the cloud of Emz's toxic hair spray suffer increasing damage, x% per hit.

list.name: HYPE
list.description: Emz recovers x health per second for each enemy Brawler inside her Super's area of effect.
